properties.verseOrder: c1 c2 v1 c1 c2 v2 c1 c2 v3 c1 c2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Naimba kwa furaha,
nacheza kwa furaha
namshukuru Mungu
Muumba mbingu
na nchi kwa kunijalia
rehema nyingi za ajabu
maishani mwangu.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
{(Ninaimba) Aiyolele iyongwe
(Nitacheza)
Ahyongwe aiyolele}. x2
Namshukuru Mungu
Muumba mbingu
na nchi kwa kunijalia
rehema nyingi za ajabu
maishani mwangu.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nitaviamsha vinanda
vinanda pia vinubi vyangu. x2
Nikutukuze wewe milele. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Malaika wote mbinguni
tazama wanakusifu wewe. x2
Uliye mungu wetu milelele. x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Makasisi wote wa Mungu
tazama wanakusifu wewe
wanakwaya pia walei
tazama tunakusifu wewe
Uliye mungu wetu milele. x2
